title: X-ACTO Crayon Pro Electric Crayon Sharpener, Electric Sharpener with SafeStart Automatic Motor, Great for Home or Schools
description: Sharpen crayons quickly and easily with X-ACTO's Crayon Pro Electric Crayon Sharpener. The crayon sharpener automatically peels back each crayons' paper cover and returns each crayon tip to its original shape. With a unique cutting mechanism, extra blade cartridge, and convenient cleaning brush to remove buildup, the automatic sharpener includes everything you need to keep standard-sized crayons in great shape.
